member.name: M:Id3.Id3Tag.Cleanup
member.summary: Removes all unassigned frames from the tag.

member.name: T:Id3.Id3TagFamily
member.summary: Specifies families of ID3 tag versions that are mutually-inclusive.

member.name: F:Id3.Id3TagFamily.Version2x
member.summary: Indicates ID3 tags in the v2 range (currently v2.2, v2.3 and v2.4). These tags appear at the beginning of the MP3 file.

member.name: F:Id3.Id3TagFamily.Version1x
member.summary: Indicates ID3 tags in the v1 range (currently v1.0 and v1.1). These tags appear at the end of the MP3 file.

member.name: M:Id3.Mp3Stream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,Id3.Mp3Permissions)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the Mp3Stream class by passing in a Stream object containing the MP3 data.
member.param: The Stream object containing the MP3 data.
The permissions applicable to the MP3 data. Defaults to read-only access.

member.name: M:Id3.Mp3Stream.#ctor(System.Byte[],Id3.Mp3Permissions)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the Mp3Stream class by passing in the MP3 data as a byte array.
member.param: The byte array representing the MP3 data.
The permissions applicable to the MP3 data. Defaults to read-only access.

member.name: T:Id3.Id3Messages
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Id3.Id3Messages.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Id3.Id3Messages.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Id3.Id3Messages.AudioStreamMissing
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Audio stream not found in this MP3 file.

member.name: P:Id3.Id3Messages.MajorTagVersionMissing
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The tag should specify a major version number.

member.name: P:Id3.Id3Messages.NoWritePermissions_CannotDeleteTag
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot delete the tag; MP3 stream does not have write permissions. You will need to create the {0} instance with write permissions..

member.name: P:Id3.Id3Messages.NoWritePermissions_CannotWriteTag
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot write the tag; MP3 stream does not have write permissions. You will need to create the {0} instance with write permissions..

member.name: P:Id3.Id3Messages.StreamNotReadableOrSeekable
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The MP3 stream should be readable and seekable.

member.name: P:Id3.Id3Messages.StreamNotWritable
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The MP3 stream should be writable.
